Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
Represents a database of bank accounts with account management capabilities. Handles account storage, transactions, and reporting.
Author:
Arjun Deshpande

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AccountDatabase()
    Constructs an empty account database with initial capacity of 4 accounts.

      Checks if a holder has an account of specific type.
      Parameters:
      profile - the account holder's profile
      type - the account type to check
      Returns:
      true if matching account exists, false otherwise
